snippet: del TUFO--Robert. On behalf of the Board of Trustees, staff and volunteers of WNET, we express our deepest sympathies on the passing of Robert del Tufo, to his beloved wife WNET Trustee Kate Nouri Hughes. Our thoughts and prayers are with her during this difficult time. James S. Tisch, Chairman; Neal Shapiro, President and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: del TUFO--Robert. On behalf of the Board of Trustees, staff and volunteers of WNET, we express our deepest sympathies on the passing of Robert del Tufo, to his beloved wife WNET Trustee Kate Nouri Hughes. Our thoughts and prayers are with her during this difficult time. James S. Tisch, Chairman; Neal Shapiro, President and CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DEL TUFO, ROBERT
